manipulations.insert_object: Add a large, ornate chandelier hanging above the crowd, casting soft shadows on the people below.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the woman's bracelet on her left wrist, ensuring no residual trace of the gold remains on her skin.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the leafy background with a bustling city street scene, keeping the lighting consistent with the original.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add a heavy rain effect with blurred raindrops and wet surfaces to the scene, making the people appear drenched.
manipulations.duplication_scale: Duplicate the red flowers above the crowd and scale them up, creating giant, vibrant blossoms.
